text: Immediately something like scales fell from his eyes, and he recovered his sight forthwith;Perhaps 70% of the Greek manuscripts do not have ‘forthwith’, and they are followed by printed editions of the Majority Text. However, the best line of transmission does have the word, as in AV and NKJV. and getting up he was baptized,Any water in the house had to be carried there, so it is improbable that there could have been enough to immerse Saul.
